steps.name: Upload the attachment with the file name is 'FileLessThan1MB.jpeg'

Input the value 'Omnis non delectus quia in facere quo.
Fugiat sit saepe qui mollitia architecto consectetur.' to the Comment text box of the attachment

parameters.name: value
parameters.value:
Omnis non delectus quia in facere quo.
Fugiat sit saepe qui mollitia architecto consectetur.

steps.name: In the header 'Add Attachment', click on the 'Save' button
Check whether the success pop up show
Get the description of the uploaded attachment in the field'File Name' with the value 'FileLessThan1MB.jpeg'
Get the description of the uploaded attachment in the field'Description' with the value 'Omnis non delectus quia in facere quo.'

parameters.name: text
parameters.value: Omnis non delectus quia in facere quo.

steps.name: Get the description of the uploaded attachment in the field'Date Added' with the value '2025-13-08'
